privacy.metaDescription: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in compliance with GDPR.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This policy describes how FIV Match collects, uses, and protects your personal data. By using our website, you agree to the practices described below.
privacy.s1Text: FIV Match is an independent matching service between patients and private fertility clinics in Romania. We are not a medical clinic and do not provide medical advice. Our role is solely to connect you with suitable clinics.
privacy.s2Text: We collect the following categories of personal data through the form on our site:
privacy.s2List: Full name|Email address|Phone number|Age (range)|City|IVF history information|Timeline and budget preferences|Optional message
privacy.s2Extra: We also automatically collect technical data: IP address (anonymized via hash), browser type, and operating system.
privacy.s3Text: Your data is processed exclusively for:
privacy.s3List: Forwarding your request to relevant partner clinics|Enabling matching clinics to contact you|Sending confirmation emails|Improving our service and analyzing site traffic
privacy.s4Text: Data processing is based on your explicit consent, given by checking the GDPR checkbox on the form (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR). You may withdraw consent at any time by contacting us at the email address below.
privacy.s5Title: 5. Who we share your data with
privacy.s5Text: Your data is shared exclusively with:
privacy.s5List: Private partner clinics in Romania, selected based on your profile|Our technical service providers (hosting, email) that comply with GDPR standards
privacy.s5Extra: We do not sell, rent, or share your data with third parties for marketing purposes.
privacy.s6Text: Your personal data is stored for a maximum of 24 months from the date of form submission, after which it is automatically deleted. You may request early deletion at any time.
privacy.s7Text: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
privacy.s7List: Right to access your personal data|Right to rectify inaccurate data|Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)|Right to restrict processing|Right to data portability|Right to object to processing|Right to lodge a complaint with ANSPDCP (Romanian Data Protection Authority)
privacy.s7Extra: To exercise these rights, contact us at: privacy@fivmatch.ro
privacy.s8Text: We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data: encryption in transit (HTTPS/TLS), IP address anonymization via cryptographic hashing, restricted database access, and regular security audits.
privacy.s9Text: Your data may be stored on servers located in the European Union or in jurisdictions that provide an adequate level of protection, as determined by European Commission decisions.
privacy.s10Text: We reserve the right to update this policy. Any changes will be published on this page with an updated date.
privacy.s11Text: For any questions about this policy or your personal data, contact us at: privacy@fivmatch.ro

terms.intro: By accessing and using the FIV Match website, you agree to the following terms and conditions. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our service.
terms.s1Text: FIV Match is a free intermediary service that connects patients with private fertility clinics in Romania. We are not a medical clinic, do not provide medical advice, do not diagnose conditions, and do not recommend treatments.
terms.s2Text: The service is intended for individuals aged 18 or older who are interested in fertility treatments in Romania. By using the service, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old.
terms.s3List: Provide accurate and complete information in the request form|Not use the service for illegal or fraudulent purposes|Not submit false or misleading information|Not attempt to disrupt the operation of the website
terms.s4Text: FIV Match acts solely as an intermediary. We do not guarantee:
terms.s4List: The availability or quality of partner clinic services|Medical outcomes of treatments|The accuracy of information provided by clinics|Contact within a specific timeframe
terms.s4Extra: The medical relationship is established directly between you and the clinic. FIV Match is not a party to this relationship.
terms.s5Text: The FIV Match service is and will remain free for patients. Partner clinics are the ones who compensate the matching service.
terms.s6Text: All website elements (text, design, logo, source code) are the property of FIV Match and are protected by copyright law. Reproduction without written consent is prohibited.
terms.s7Text: FIV Match does not assume liability for:
terms.s7List: Medical decisions made based on information received through the service|The quality of services provided by partner clinics|Direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the service|Temporary service interruptions due to technical reasons
terms.s8Text: The processing of personal data is governed by our Privacy Policy. By using the service, you confirm that you have read and accepted this policy.
terms.s9Text: These terms are governed by the laws of Romania. Any disputes will be resolved by the competent courts in Romania.
terms.s10Text: We reserve the right to amend these terms at any time. Amendments take effect on the date of publication on this page.
terms.s11Text: For any questions about these terms: leads@fivmatch.ro

cookiePolicy.metaDescription: Information about cookies used on the FIV Match website.
cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.intro: This page explains how FIV Match uses cookies and similar technologies on our website.
cookiePolicy.s1Text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow the site to remember information about your visit, making navigation easier and improving user experience.
cookiePolicy.s2Text1: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled. They include session cookies, language preference, and cookie consent.
cookiePolicy.s2Text2: We use Google Analytics 4 to understand how the site is used. These cookies collect anonymized data about pages visited, visit duration, and traffic source. They are only activated with your explicit consent.
cookiePolicy.s2Text3: We may use cookies from Google Ads to measure advertising campaign effectiveness. These cookies are only activated with your explicit consent.
cookiePolicy.s3Text: Our site implements Google Consent Mode v2, which respects your cookie choices. If you choose 'Only essential', analytics and marketing cookies remain deactivated. If you choose 'Accept all', we activate them to improve the service.
cookiePolicy.s4Text: You can change your cookie preferences at any time:
cookiePolicy.s4List: Through the consent banner that appears on your first visit|By clearing cookies in your browser settings|By using browser extensions that block cookies
cookiePolicy.s4Extra: Disabling essential cookies may affect the proper functioning of the website.
cookiePolicy.s5Text: Some cookies are placed by third-party services (Google Analytics, Google Ads). These companies have their own privacy and cookie policies, which we encourage you to review.
cookiePolicy.s6Text: Essential cookies expire at the end of the session or after a maximum of 12 months. Analytics cookies are stored according to the Google Analytics policy (typically 14 months).
cookiePolicy.s7Text: For questions about our cookies: leads@fivmatch.ro
